Does the video have to be on during a Zo.question: Does the video have to be on during a Zoom meeting?
examples: Switch on video for my class.
Do I have to turn on my video during a Zoom session?
The response to any of these questions or prompts is:
Does the video have to be on during a Zo.answer: You don't have to turn on your video during a Zoom session. It’s up to you. However, interactions would be humanized and improved if your peers could put a face to your name and voice.
